alert.note: Alert for Allen; Barren; Edmonson; Grayson; Hardin; Hart; Larue; Monroe; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:57PM EDT until April 05 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Larue County in central Kentucky... West central Monroe County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Simpson County in south central Kentucky... Hart County in central Kentucky... Allen County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Grayson County in central Kentucky... Central Warren County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Hardin County in central Kentucky... Barren County in south central Kentucky... Edmonson County in south central Kentucky... * Until 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/. * At 457 PM EDT/357 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles east of Leitchfield to near Portland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hodgenville and Scottsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Barren; Edmonson; Grayson; Hardin; Hart; Larue; Monroe; Simpson; Warren
